original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(3286)@</color>施展一下強力的橫掃，使用武器揮過的風壓衝擊敵人，以<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(3286)@</color><color=#80cc00>武力</color>對敵人造成物理傷害。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(3286)@</color> Perform a powerful sweep and use the wind pressure of the weapon to hit the enemy with <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(3286)@</color><color=#80cc00>War</color> causes physical damage to the enemy.
